title: add ssl_context option to `flask run`
raw_output: Issue 2594 requests adding ssl_context option to the 'flask run' command to enable HTTPS during development. The fix involves adding a --cert/--key option to the run command in cli.py. Predicted files: (1) flask/cli.py - the CLI module where the run command is defined. (2) CHANGES - changelog entry for the new feature. (3) tests/test_cli.py - CLI tests. Exploration: Matched flask/cli.py -> tests/test_cli.py for test coverage.
